comment: There is a unique word having the length of a given word increased by 1 with the given word as prefix if there is a unique symbol which extends the given word. (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 6-Oct-2018.) (Revised by AV, 21-Jan-2022.) (Revised by AV, 10-May-2022.) (Proof shortened by AV, 13-Oct-2022.)
